name: RubyChess by Yiğit Efe Özdemir
description:
Some chess lol idk

But hey!It has a difference from other dijital chess games!

1.It has an autoflip feature,which means the screen will flip according to the side!

2.You can turn on/off coordinates

3.You can save your game,then continue playing it with your friend!

Now hop on to the game and proove your intellectual superiority!
